org.restlet
Class Manager

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.Manager

public class Manager
extends Object

The main manager that also acts as an object factory. Façade around the current Restlet API implementation.

createRestletCall

public static RestletCall createRestletCall(UniformCall call)
Returns a new restlet call wrapping a given uniform call. Developers who need to extend the default restlet calls should override it.

Parameters:
call - The uniform call to wrap.
Returns:
A new restlet call.
